message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000.  I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $13,000?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
